# histogrammedApplicationResumeTime

**Instance Property**

A histogram of the different amounts of time taken to resume the app from the background.

## Declaration

```swift
var histogrammedApplicationResumeTime: MXHistogram<UnitDuration> { get }
```

## Viewing app launch and resume time

- **histogrammedOptimizedTimeToFirstDraw**: A histogram of the different amounts of time associated with prewarmed app launches.
- **histogrammedTimeToFirstDraw**: A histogram of the different amounts of time taken to launch the app.
- **histogrammedExtendedLaunch**: A histogram of the different amounts of time taken to launch the app, including the extended launch tasks.
